Statute.Title: Foreign Influence Transparency and Accountability Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Transparence et la responsabilité en matière d’influence étrangère, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness (s. 2)

General.Text: Report and tabling in each house of parliament, 2024, c. 16, ss. 28 and 29

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 16, ss. 1 to 35 as enacted by 2024, c. 16, s. 113 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 117 — Not in force
